name: Isekai With Friends
description:
Join another player Sam or "Player Namer Here” your friend
who has convinced you to play their favourite MMO. Isekai 
with friends. Sam has quickly built you a character and 
payed for you to be  leveled enough to join her in the new
expansion. “Demon Kings Tower.”

When you begin the game you discover that Sam has min
maxed your character so that you have incredible magic
but are horrible at anything else. 

Talk with Sam and cast spells using your voice as you learn
the ropes of this world,choose how you will progress and climb 
the Demon Kings Tower.

Made for Audiogame Jam 2020
